2510 /**
2511  * Perform one discrete step for all nodes
2512  */ 
2513 links.Network.prototype._discreteStepNodes = function() {
2514   var interval = this.refreshRate / 1000.0; // in seconds
2515   var nodes = this.nodes;
2516   for (var n = 0, nMax = nodes.length; n < nMax; n++) {
2517     nodes[n].discreteStep(interval);
2518   }
2519 }
2520 
2521 
2522 /**
2523  * Perform one discrete step for all packages
2524  */ 
2525 links.Network.prototype._discreteStepPackages = function() {
2526   var interval = this.refreshRate / 1000.0; // in seconds
2527   var packages = this.packages;
2528   for (var n = 0, nMax = packages.length; n < nMax; n++) {
2529     packages[n].discreteStep(interval);
2530   }  
2531 }
2532 
2533 
2534 /**
2535  * Cleanup finished packages. 
2536  * also checks if there are moving packages
2537  */ 
2538 links.Network.prototype._deleteFinishedPackages = function() {
2539   var n = 0;
2540   var hasMovingPackages = false;
2541   while (n < this.packages.length) {
2542     if (this.packages[n].isFinished()) {
2543       this.packages.splice(n, 1);
2544       n--;
2545     }
2546     else if (this.packages[n].isMoving()) {
2547       hasMovingPackages = true;
2548     }
2549     n++;
2550   }
2551   
2552   this.hasMovingPackages = hasMovingPackages;
2553 }
2554 
2555 /**
2556  * Start animating nodes, links, and packages.
2557  */ 
2558 links.Network.prototype.start = function() {
2559   if (this.hasMovingNodes) {
2560     this._calculateForces();
2561     this._discreteStepNodes();
2562 
2563     var vmin = this.constants.minVelocity;
2564     this.hasMovingNodes = this.isMoving(vmin);
2565   }
2566 
2567   if (this.hasMovingPackages) {
2568     this._discreteStepPackages();
2569     this._deleteFinishedPackages();
2570   }
2571 
2572   if (this.hasMovingNodes || this.hasMovingLinks || this.hasMovingPackages) {
2573     // start animation. only start timer if it is not already running
2574     if (!this.timer) {
2575       var network = this;
2576       this.timer = window.setTimeout(function () {
2577         network.timer = undefined;
2578         network.start();
2579         network._redraw();
2580       }, this.refreshRate);
2581     }
2582   }
2583   else {
2584     this._redraw();
2585   }
2586 }
2587 
2588 /**
2589  * Stop animating nodes, links, and packages.
2590  */ 
2591 links.Network.prototype.stop = function () {
2592   if (this.timer) {
2593     window.clearInterval(this.timer);
2594     this.timer = undefined;
2595   } 
2596 }

2603 /**
2604  * Add and event listener. Works for all browsers
2605  * @param {DOM Element} element    An html element
2606  * @param {string}      action     The action, for example "click", 
2607  *                                 without the prefix "on"
2608  * @param {function}    listener   The callback function to be executed
2609  * @param {boolean}     useCapture
2610  */ 
2611 links.Network.addEventListener = function (element, action, listener, useCapture) {
2612   if (element.addEventListener) {
2613     if (useCapture === undefined)
2614       useCapture = false;
2615       
2616     if (action === "mousewheel" && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") >= 0) {
2617       action = "DOMMouseScroll";  // For Firefox
2618     }
2619       
2620     element.addEventListener(action, listener, useCapture);
2621   } else {    
2622     element.attachEvent("on" + action, listener);  // IE browsers
2623   }
2624 };
2625 
2626 /**
2627  * Remove an event listener from an element
2628  * @param {DOM element}  element   An html dom element
2629  * @param {string}       action    The name of the event, for example "mousedown"
2630  * @param {function}     listener  The listener function
2631  * @param {boolean}      useCapture
2632  */ 
2633 links.Network.removeEventListener = function(element, action, listener, useCapture) {
2634   if (element.removeEventListener) {
2635     // non-IE browsers
2636     if (useCapture === undefined)
2637       useCapture = false;    
2638           
2639     if (action === "mousewheel" && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") >= 0) {
2640       action = "DOMMouseScroll";  // For Firefox
2641     }
2642       
2643     element.removeEventListener(action, listener, useCapture); 
2644   } else {
2645     // IE browsers
2646     element.detachEvent("on" + action, listener);
2647   }
2648 };

2651 /**
2652  * Stop event propagation
2653  */ 
2654 links.Network.stopPropagation = function (event) {
2655   if (!event) 
2656     var event = window.event;
2657   
2658   if (event.stopPropagation) {
2659     event.stopPropagation();  // non-IE browsers
2660   }
2661   else {
2662     event.cancelBubble = true;  // IE browsers
2663   }
2664 }
2665 
2666 
2667 /**
2668  * Cancels the event if it is cancelable, without stopping further propagation of the event.
2669  */ 
2670 links.Network.preventDefault = function (event) {
2671   if (!event) 
2672     var event = window.event;
2673   
2674   if (event.preventDefault) {
2675     event.preventDefault();  // non-IE browsers
2676   }
2677   else {    
2678     event.returnValue = false;  // IE browsers
2679   }
2680 }
2681 
2682 /**
2683  * Retrieve the absolute left value of a DOM element
2684  * @param {DOM element} elem    A dom element, for example a div
2685  * @return {number} left        The absolute left position of this element
2686  *                              in the browser page.
2687  */ 
2688 links.Network._getAbsoluteLeft = function(elem) {
2689   var left = 0;
2690   while( elem != null ) {
2691     left += elem.offsetLeft;
2692     left -= elem.scrollLeft;
2693     elem = elem.offsetParent;
2694   }
2695   if (!document.body.scrollLeft && window.pageXOffset) {
2696       // FF
2697       left -= window.pageXOffset;
2698   }
2699   return left;
2700 }
2701 
2702 /**
2703  * Retrieve the absolute top value of a DOM element
2704  * @param {DOM element} elem    A dom element, for example a div
2705  * @return {number} top         The absolute top position of this element
2706  *                              in the browser page.
2707  */ 
2708 links.Network._getAbsoluteTop = function(elem) {
2709   var top = 0;
2710   while( elem != null ) {
2711     top += elem.offsetTop;
2712     top -= elem.scrollTop;
2713     elem = elem.offsetParent;
2714   }
2715   if (!document.body.scrollTop && window.pageYOffset) {
2716       // FF
2717       top -= window.pageYOffset;
2718   }
2719   return top;
2720 }

2727 /**
2728  * @class Node
2729  * A node. A node can be connected to other nodes via one or multiple links.
2730  * @param {object} properties An object containing properties for the node. All
2731  *                            properties are optional, except for the id.
2732  *                              {number} id     Id of the node. Required
2733  *                              {string} text   Title for the node
2734  *                              {number} x      Horizontal position of the node
2735  *                              {number} y      Vertical position of the node
2736  *                              {string} style  Drawing style, available: 
2737  *                                              "database", "circle", "rect", 
2738  *                                              "image", "text", "dot", "star",
2739  *                                              "triangle", "triangleDown", 
2740  *                                              "square"
2741  *                              {string} image  An image url
2742  *                              {string} title  An title text, can be HTML 
2743  *                              {anytype} group A group name or number
2744  * @param {links.Network.Images} imagelist    A list with images. Only needed
2745  *                                            when the node has an image
2746  * @param {links.Network.Groups} grouplist    A list with groups. Needed for 
2747  *                                            retrieving group properties 
2748  * @param {Object}               constants    An object with default values for
2749  *                                            example for the color
2750  */ 
2751 links.Network.Node = function (properties, imagelist, grouplist, constants) {
2752   this.selected = false;
2753 
2754   this.group = constants.nodes.group;
2755   
2756   this.fontSize = constants.nodes.fontSize;
2757   this.fontFace = constants.nodes.fontFace;
2758   this.fontColor = constants.nodes.fontColor;
2759 
2760   this.borderColor = constants.nodes.borderColor;
2761   this.backgroundColor = constants.nodes.backgroundColor;
2762   this.highlightColor = constants.nodes.highlightColor;
2763   
2764   // set defaults for the properties
2765   this.id = undefined;
2766   this.style = constants.nodes.style;
2767   this.image = constants.nodes.image;
2768   this.x = 0;
2769   this.y = 0;
2770   this.xFixed = false;
2771   this.yFixed = false;
2772   this.radius = constants.nodes.radius;
2773   this.radiusFixed = false;
2774   this.radiusMin = constants.nodes.radiusMin;
2775   this.radiusMax = constants.nodes.radiusMax;
2776 
2777   this.imagelist = imagelist;
2778   this.grouplist = grouplist;
2779   
2780   this.setProperties(properties, constants);  
2781   
2782   // mass, force, velocity
2783   this.mass = 50;  // kg
2784   this.fx = 0.0;  // external force x
2785   this.fy = 0.0;  // external force y
2786   this.vx = 0.0;  // velocity x
2787   this.vy = 0.0;  // velocity y
2788   this.damping = 0.5; // damping factor   TODO: choose better damping factor?
2789 }

2791 
2792 /**
2793  * Set or overwrite properties for the node
2794  * @param {Object} properties an object with properties
2795  * @param {Object} constants  and object with default, global properties
2796  */ 
2797 links.Network.Node.prototype.setProperties = function(properties, constants) {
2798   if (!properties) {
2799     return;
2800   }
2801 
2802   if (properties.id != undefined) {this.id = properties.id;}
2803   if (properties.style != undefined) {this.style = properties.style;}
2804   if (properties.text != undefined)  {this.text = properties.text;}
2805   if (properties.title != undefined) {this.title = properties.title;}
2806   if (properties.image != undefined) {this.image = properties.image;}
2807   if (properties.group != undefined) {this.group = properties.group;}
2808   if (properties.x != undefined)     {this.x = properties.x;}
2809   if (properties.y != undefined)     {this.y = properties.y;}
2810   if (properties.radius != undefined){this.radius = properties.radius;}
2811   if (properties.value != undefined) {this.value = properties.value;}
2812   if (properties.timestamp != undefined) {this.timestamp = properties.timestamp;}
2813 
2814   if (this.id === undefined) {
2815     throw "Node must have an id";
2816   }
2817 
2818   if (this.group) {
2819     var groupObj = this.grouplist.get(this.group);
2820     for (var prop in groupObj) {
2821       if (groupObj.hasOwnProperty(prop)) {
2822         this[prop] = groupObj[prop];
2823       }
2824     }
2825   }
2826 
2827   if (this.image != undefined) {
2828     if (this.imagelist) {
2829       this.imageObj = this.imagelist.load(this.image);
2830     } 
2831     else {
2832       throw "No imagelist provided";
2833     }
2834   }
2835   
2836   this.xFixed = this.xFixed || (properties.x != undefined);
2837   this.yFixed = this.yFixed || (properties.y != undefined);
2838   this.radiusFixed = this.radiusFixed || (properties.radius != undefined);
2839   
2840   if (this.style == 'image') {
2841     this.radiusMin = constants.nodes.widthMin;
2842     this.radiusMax = constants.nodes.widthMax;
2843   }
2844   
2845   // choose draw method depending on the style
2846   var style = this.style;
2847   switch (style) {
2848     case 'database':      this.draw = this._drawDatabase; break;      
2849     case 'rect':          this.draw = this._drawRect; break;
2850     case 'circle':        this.draw = this._drawCircle; break;
2851     case 'image':         this.draw = this._drawImage; break;
2852     case 'text':          this.draw = this._drawText; break;
2853     case 'dot':           this.draw = this._drawDot; break;
2854     case 'square':        this.draw = this._drawSquare; break;
2855     case 'triangle':      this.draw = this._drawTriangle; break;
2856     case 'triangleDown':  this.draw = this._drawTriangleDown; break;
2857     case 'star':          this.draw = this._drawStar; break;
2858     default:              this.draw = this._drawText; break;
2859   }    
2860 
2861   // reset the size of the node, this can be changed
2862   this.width = undefined;
2863   this.height = undefined;
2864 }

2913  * @param {number} fy   Force in vertical direction

2917   this.fy += fy;

2920 /**
2921  * Perform one discrete step for the node
2922  * @param {number} interval    Time interval in seconds
2923  */ 
2924 links.Network.Node.prototype.discreteStep = function(interval) {
2925   if (!this.xFixed) {
2926     var dx   = -this.damping * this.vx;     // damping force
2927     var ax   = (this.fx + dx) / this.mass;  // acceleration
2928     this.vx += ax / interval;               // velocity
2929     this.x  += this.vx / interval;          // position
2930   }
2931 
2932   if (!this.yFixed) {
2933     var dy   = -this.damping * this.vy;     // damping force
2934     var ay   = (this.fy + dy) / this.mass;  // acceleration
2935     this.vy += ay / interval;               // velocity
2936     this.y  += this.vy / interval;          // position
2937   }
2938 }

2949 /**
2950  * Check if this node is moving
2951  * @param {number} vmin   the minimum velocity considered as "moving"
2952  * @return {boolean}      true if moving, false if it has no velocity
2953  */ 
2954 // TODO: replace this method with calculating the kinetic energy
2955 links.Network.Node.prototype.isMoving = function(vmin) {
2956   var fmin = 0.005; // TODO
2957   return (this.vx > vmin || this.vx < -vmin ||
2958           this.vy > vmin || this.vy < -vmin ||
2959           (!this.xFixed && Math.abs(this.fx) > fmin) || 
2960           (!this.yFixed && Math.abs(this.fy) > fmin));
2961 }

2979 /**
2980  * Calculate the distance from the nodes location to the given location (x,y)
2981  * @param {Number} x
2982  * @param {Number} y
2983  * @return {Number} value
2984  */ 
2985 links.Network.Node.prototype.getDistance = function(x, y) {
2986   var dx = this.x - x,
2987       dy = this.y - y;
2988   return Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
2989 }

2999   if (!this.radiusFixed && this.value !== undefined) {

3020   return (this.left              < obj.right &&

3027 links.Network.Node.prototype._drawImage = function (ctx) {
3028   // TODO: pre calculate the image size
3029   if (this.value) {
3030     var scale = this.imageObj.height / this.imageObj.width;
3031     var width = this.radius || this.imageObj.width;
3032     var height = this.radius * scale || this.imageObj.height;
3033   }
3034   else {
3035     var width = this.imageObj.width;
3036     var height = this.imageObj.height;
3037   }
3038   this.left   = this.x - width / 2;
3039   this.top    = this.y - height / 2;
3040   this.width  = width;
3041   this.height = height;
3042   
3043   if (this.imageObj) {
3044     ctx.drawImage(this.imageObj, this.left, this.top, width, height);
3045     var ytext = this.y + height / 2;
3046   }
3047   else {
3048     // image still loading... just draw the text for now
3049     var ytext = this.y;
3050   }
3051 
3052   this._text(ctx, this.text, this.x, ytext, undefined, "top");
3053 }

3056 links.Network.Node.prototype._drawRect = function (ctx) {
3057   if (!this.width) {
3058     var margin = 5;
3059     var textSize = this.getTextSize(ctx);
3060     this.width = textSize.width + 2 * margin;
3061     this.height = textSize.height + 2 * margin;
3062   }
3063   this.left = this.x - this.width / 2;
3064   this.top = this.y - this.height / 2;
3065 
3066   ctx.strokeStyle = this.borderColor;
3067   ctx.fillStyle = this.selected ? this.highlightColor : this.backgroundColor;
3068   ctx.lineWidth = this.selected ? 2.0 : 1.0;
3069   ctx.roundRect(this.left, this.top, this.width, this.height, this.radius);
3070   ctx.fill();
3071   ctx.stroke();
3072 
3073   this._text(ctx, this.text, this.x, this.y);
3074 }

3104

3110

3115   ctx.fill();

3141 links.Network.Node.prototype._drawShape = function (ctx, shape) {
3142   if (!this.width) {
3143     var margin = 5;
3144     this.width = 2 * this.radius;
3145     this.height = this.width;
3146   }
3147   this.left = this.x - this.width / 2;
3148   this.top = this.y - this.height / 2;
3149   
3150   ctx.strokeStyle = this.borderColor;
3151   ctx.fillStyle = this.selected ? this.highlightColor : this.backgroundColor;
3152   ctx.lineWidth = this.selected ? 2.0 : 1.0;
3153 
3154   ctx[shape](this.x, this.y, this.radius);
3155   ctx.fill();
3156   ctx.stroke();
3157 
3158   if (this.text) {
3159     this._text(ctx, this.text, this.x, this.y + this.height / 2, undefined, 'top');
3160   }
3161 }

3169     this.height = textSize.height + 2 * margin;
3170   }
3171   this.left = this.x - this.width / 2;
3172   this.top = this.y - this.height / 2;  
3173   
3174   this._text(ctx, this.text, this.x, this.y);

3178 links.Network.Node.prototype._text = function (ctx, text, x, y, align, baseline) {
3179   if (text) {
3180     ctx.font = (this.selected ? "bold " : "") + this.fontSize + "px " + this.fontFace;
3181     ctx.fillStyle = this.fontColor || "black";    
3182     ctx.textAlign = align || "center";
3183     ctx.textBaseline = baseline || "middle";
3184     
3185     var lines = text.split('\n'),
3186         lineCount = lines.length,
3187         fontSize = (this.fontSize + 4),
3188         yLine = y + (1 - lineCount) / 2 * fontSize;
3189 
3190     for (var i = 0; i < lineCount; i++) {
3191       ctx.fillText(lines[i], x, yLine);
3192       yLine += fontSize;
3193     }
3194   }
3195 }

3197 
3198 links.Network.Node.prototype.getTextSize = function(ctx) {
3199   if (this.text != undefined) {
3200     ctx.font = (this.selected ? "bold " : "") + this.fontSize + "px " + this.fontFace;
3201 
3202     var lines = this.text.split('\n'),
3203         height = (this.fontSize + 4) * lines.length,
3204         width = 0;
3205 
3206     for (var i = 0, iMax = lines.length; i < iMax; i++) {
3207       width = Math.max(width, ctx.measureText(lines[i]).width);
3208     }
3209 
3210     return {"width": width, "height": height};
3211   }
3212   else {
3213     return {"width": 0, "height": 0};
3214   }
3215 }

3222 /**
3223  * @class Link
3224  * 
3225  * A link connects two nodes
3226  * @param {Object} properties     Object with properties. Must contain
3227  *                                At least properties from and to.
3228  *                                Available properties: from (number),
3229  *                                to (number), color (string),
3230  *                                width (number), style (string), 
3231  *                                length (number), title (string)
3232  * @param {links.Network} network A network object, used to find and link to 
3233  *                                nodes.
3234  * @param {Object} constants      An object with default values for
3235  *                                example for the color
3236  */ 
3237 links.Network.Link = function (properties, network, constants) {
3238   if (!network) {
3239     throw "No network provided";
3240   }
3241   this.network = network;
3242   
3243   // initialize constants
3244   this.widthMin = constants.links.widthMin;
3245   this.widthMax = constants.links.widthMax;
3246 
3247   // initialize variables
3248   this.id     = undefined;
3249   this.style  = constants.links.style;
3250   this.title  = undefined;
3251   this.width  = constants.links.width;
3252   this.value  = undefined;
3253   this.length = constants.links.length;
3254   this.stiffness = undefined; // depends on the length of the link
3255   this.color  = constants.links.color;
3256   this.timestamp  = undefined;
3257   this.widthFixed = false;
3258   this.lengthFixed = false;
3259 
3260   this.setProperties(properties);
3261 }
3262 
3263 /**
3264  * Set or overwrite properties for the link
3265  * @param {Object} properties          An object with properties
3266  */ 
3267 links.Network.Link.prototype.setProperties = function(properties) {
3268   if (!properties) {
3269     return;
3270   }
3271   
3272   if (properties.from != undefined) {this.from = this.network._getNode(properties.from);}
3273   if (properties.to != undefined) {this.to = this.network._getNode(properties.to);}
3274 
3275   if (properties.id != undefined) {this.id = properties.id;}
3276   if (properties.style != undefined) {this.style = properties.style;}
3277   if (properties.title != undefined) {this.title = properties.title;}
3278   if (properties.width != undefined) {this.width = properties.width;}
3279   if (properties.value != undefined) {this.value = properties.value;}
3280   if (properties.length != undefined) {this.length = properties.length;}
3281   if (properties.color != undefined) {this.color = properties.color;}
3282   if (properties.timestamp != undefined) {this.timestamp = properties.timestamp;}
3283   
3284   if (!this.from) {
3285     throw "Node with id " + properties.from + " not found";
3286   }
3287   if (!this.to) {
3288     throw "Node with id " + properties.to + " not found";
3289   }
3290 
3291   this.widthFixed = this.widthFixed || (properties.width != undefined);
3292   this.lengthFixed = this.lengthFixed || (properties.length != undefined);
3293 
3294   this.stiffness = 1 / this.length;
3295 
3296   // initialize animation
3297   if (this.style === 'arrow') {
3298     this.arrows = [0.5];
3299     this.animation = false;
3300   }
3301   else if (this.style === 'moving-arrows') {
3302     this.arrows = [];
3303     var arrowCount = 3; // TODO: make customizable
3304     for (var a = 0; a < arrowCount; a++) {
3305       this.arrows.push(a / arrowCount);
3306     }    
3307     this.animation = true;
3308   }
3309   else if (this.style === 'moving-dot') {
3310     this.dot = 0.0;
3311     this.animation = true;
3312   }
3313   else {
3314     this.animation = false;
3315   }
3316   
3317   // set draw method based on style
3318   switch (this.style) {
3319     case 'line':          this.draw = this._drawLine; break;
3320     case 'arrow':         this.draw = this._drawArrow; break;
3321     case 'moving-arrows': this.draw = this._drawMovingArrows; break;
3322     case 'moving-dot':    this.draw = this._drawMovingDot; break;
3323     default:              this.draw = this._drawLine; break;
3324   }  
3325 }

3411 /**
3412  * Check if this object is overlapping with the provided object
3413  * @param {Object} obj   an object with parameters left, top
3414  * @return {boolean}     True if location is located on the link
3415  */ 
3416 links.Network.Link.prototype.isOverlappingWith = function(obj) {
3417   var distMax = 10;
3418 
3419   var xFrom = this.from.x;
3420   var yFrom = this.from.y;
3421   var xTo = this.to.x;
3422   var yTo = this.to.y;
3423   var xObj = obj.left;
3424   var yObj = obj.top;
3425 
3426   
3427   var dist = links.Network._dist(xFrom, yFrom, xTo, yTo, xObj, yObj);
3428   
3429   return (dist < distMax);
3430 }
3431 
3432 /**
3433  * Calculate the distance between a point (x3,y3) and a line segment from
3434  * (x1,y1) to (x2,y2).
3435  * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/849211/shortest-distancae-between-a-point-and-a-line-segment
3436  * @param {number} x1
3437  * @param {number} y1
3438  * @param {number} x2
3439  * @param {number} y2
3440  * @param {number} x3
3441  * @param {number} y3
3442  */ 
3443 links.Network._dist = function (x1,y1, x2,y2, x3,y3) { // x3,y3 is the point
3444   var px = x2-x1,
3445       py = y2-y1,
3446       something = px*px + py*py,
3447       u =  ((x3 - x1) * px + (y3 - y1) * py) / something;
3448 
3449   if (u > 1) {
3450     u = 1;
3451   }
3452   else if (u < 0) {
3453     u = 0;
3454   }
3455 
3456   var x = x1 + u * px,
3457       y = y1 + u * py,
3458       dx = x - x3,
3459       dy = y - y3;
3460 
3461   //# Note: If the actual distance does not matter,
3462   //# if you only want to compare what this function
3463   //# returns to other results of this function, you
3464   //# can just return the squared distance instead
3465   //# (i.e. remove the sqrt) to gain a little performance
3466 
3467   d = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
3468 
3469   return d;
3470 }
3471 
3472 
3473 /**
3474  * Redraw a link as a line
3475  * Draw this link in the given canvas
3476  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3477  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3478  */ 
3479 links.Network.Link.prototype._drawLine = function(ctx) {
3480   // set style
3481   ctx.strokeStyle = this.color;
3482   ctx.lineWidth = this.width;
3483   
3484   ctx.beginPath();
3485   ctx.moveTo(this.from.x, this.from.y);
3486   ctx.lineTo(this.to.x, this.to.y); 
3487   ctx.stroke();
3488 }
3489 
3490 /**
3491  * Redraw a link as a line with a moving arrow
3492  * Draw this link in the given canvas
3493  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3494  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3495  */ 
3496 links.Network.Link.prototype._drawMovingArrows = function(ctx) {
3497   this._drawArrow(ctx);
3498   
3499   for (var a in this.arrows) {
3500     if (this.arrows.hasOwnProperty(a)) {
3501       this.arrows[a] += 0.02;  // TODO determine speed from interval
3502       if (this.arrows[a] > 1.0) this.arrows[a] = 0.0; 
3503     }
3504   }
3505 }
3506 
3507 /**
3508  * Redraw a link as a line with a moving dot
3509  * Draw this link in the given canvas
3510  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3511  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3512  */ 
3513 links.Network.Link.prototype._drawMovingDot = function(ctx) {
3514   // set style
3515   ctx.strokeStyle = this.color;
3516   ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
3517   ctx.lineWidth = this.width;
3518   
3519   // draw line
3520   ctx.beginPath();
3521   ctx.moveTo(this.from.x, this.from.y);
3522   ctx.lineTo(this.to.x, this.to.y); 
3523   ctx.stroke();
3524 
3525   // draw dot
3526   var radius = 4 + this.width * 2;
3527   var xc = (1 - this.dot) * this.from.x + this.dot * this.to.x;
3528   var yc = (1 - this.dot) * this.from.y + this.dot * this.to.y;
3529   ctx.circle(xc, yc, radius);
3530   ctx.fill();
3531   
3532   // move the dot to the next position
3533   this.dot += 0.05;  // TODO determine speed from interval
3534   if (this.dot > 1.0) this.dot = 0.0; 
3535 }
3536 
3537 
3538 /**
3539  * Redraw a link as a line with an arrow
3540  * Draw this link in the given canvas
3541  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3542  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3543  */ 
3544 links.Network.Link.prototype._drawArrow = function(ctx) {
3545   // set style
3546   ctx.strokeStyle = this.color;
3547   ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
3548   ctx.lineWidth = this.width;
3549   
3550   ctx.beginPath();
3551   ctx.moveTo(this.from.x, this.from.y);
3552   ctx.lineTo(this.to.x, this.to.y); 
3553   ctx.stroke();
3554   
3555   // draw all arrows
3556   var angle = Math.atan2((this.to.y - this.from.y), (this.to.x - this.from.x));
3557   var length = 10 + 5 * this.width; // TODO: make customizable?
3558   for (var a in this.arrows) {
3559     if (this.arrows.hasOwnProperty(a)) {
3560       var arrow = this.arrows[a];
3561       
3562       var xc = (1 - arrow) * this.from.x + arrow * this.to.x;
3563       var yc = (1 - arrow) * this.from.y + arrow * this.to.y;
3564       ctx.arrow(xc, yc, angle, length);
3565       ctx.fill();
3566       ctx.stroke();
3567     }
3568   }
3569 }

3579   this.images = {};
3580 
3581   this.callback = undefined;
3582 }

3584 /**
3585  * Set an onload callback function. This will be called each time an image
3586  * is loaded
3587  * @param {function} callback
3588  */ 
3589 links.Network.Images.prototype.setOnloadCallback = function(callback) {
3590   this.callback = callback;
3591 }

3594 /**
3595  * 
3596  * @param {string} url          Url of the image 
3597  * @return {Image} img          The image object
3598  */ 
3599 links.Network.Images.prototype.load = function(url) {
3600   var img = this.images[url];
3601   if (img == undefined) {
3602     // create the image
3603     var images = this;
3604     img = new Image();
3605     this.images[url] = img;
3606     img.onload = function() {
3607       if (images.callback) {
3608         images.callback(this);
3609       }
3610     }
3611     img.src = url;
3612   }
3613   
3614   return img;
3615 }

3621 /**
3622  * @class Package
3623  * This class contains one package
3624  * 
3625  * @param {number} properties  Properties for the package. Optional. Available
3626  *                             properties are: id {number}, title {string},
3627  *                             style {string} with available values "dot" and 
3628  *                             "image", radius {number}, image {string},
3629  *                             color {string}, progress {number} with a value
3630  *                             between 0-1, duration {number}, timestamp {number
3631  *                             or Date}.
3632  * @param {links.Network}      network        The network object, used to find
3633  *                                            and link to nodes. 
3634  * @param {links.Network.Images} imagelist    An Images object. Only needed
3635  *                                            when the package has style 'image'
3636  * @param {Object}               constants    An object with default values for
3637  *                                            example for the color
3638  */ 
3639 links.Network.Package = function (properties, network, imagelist, constants) {
3640   if (network == undefined) {
3641     throw "No network provided";
3642   }
3643 
3644   // constants
3645   this.radiusMin = constants.packages.radiusMin;
3646   this.radiusMax = constants.packages.radiusMax;
3647   this.imagelist = imagelist;
3648   this.network = network;
3649 
3650   // initialize variables
3651   this.id =        undefined;
3652   this.from =      undefined;
3653   this.to =        undefined;
3654   this.title =     undefined;
3655   this.style =     constants.packages.style;
3656   this.radius =    constants.packages.radius;
3657   this.color =     constants.packages.color;
3658   this.image =     constants.packages.image;
3659   this.value =     undefined;
3660   this.progress =  0.0;
3661   this.timestamp = undefined;
3662   this.duration = constants.packages.duration;
3663   this.autoProgress = true;
3664   this.radiusFixed = false;
3665 
3666   // set properties
3667   this.setProperties(properties, constants);
3668 }
3669 
3670 links.Network.Package.DEFAULT_DURATION = 1.0; // seconds
3671 
3672 /**
3673  * Set or overwrite properties for the package
3674  * @param {Object} properties an object with properties
3675  * @param {Object} constants  and object with default, global properties
3676  */ 
3677 links.Network.Package.prototype.setProperties = function(properties, constants) {
3678   if (!properties) {
3679     return;
3680   }
3681 
3682   // note that the provided properties can also be null, when they come from the Google DataTable
3683   if (properties.from != undefined) {this.from = this.network._getNode(properties.from);}
3684   if (properties.to != undefined) {this.to = this.network._getNode(properties.to);}
3685 
3686   if (!this.from) {
3687     throw "Node with id " + properties.from + " not found";
3688   }
3689   if (!this.to) {
3690     throw "Node with id " + properties.to + " not found";
3691   }
3692 
3693   if (properties.id != undefined) {this.id = properties.id;}
3694   if (properties.title != undefined) {this.title = properties.title;}
3695   if (properties.style != undefined) {this.style = properties.style;}
3696   if (properties.radius != undefined) {this.radius = properties.radius;}
3697   if (properties.value != undefined) {this.value = properties.value;}
3698   if (properties.image != undefined) {this.image = properties.image;}
3699   if (properties.color != undefined) {this.color = properties.color;}
3700   if (properties.progress != undefined) {this.progress = properties.progress;}
3701   if (properties.timestamp != undefined) {this.timestamp = properties.timestamp;}
3702   if (properties.duration != undefined) {this.duration = properties.duration;}
3703 
3704   this.radiusFixed = this.radiusFixed || (properties.radius != undefined);
3705   this.autoProgress = (this.autoProgress == true) ? (properties.progress == undefined) : false;
3706 
3707   if (this.style == 'image') {
3708     this.radiusMin = constants.packages.widthMin;
3709     this.radiusMax = constants.packages.widthMax;
3710   }
3711   
3712   // handle progress
3713   if (this.progress < 0.0) {this.progress = 0.0;}
3714   if (this.progress > 1.0) {this.progress = 1.0;}
3715   
3716   // handle image
3717   if (this.image != undefined) {
3718     if (this.imagelist) {
3719       this.imageObj = this.imagelist.load(this.image);
3720     } 
3721     else {
3722       throw "No imagelist provided";
3723     }
3724   }
3725   
3726   // choose draw method depending on the style
3727   switch (this.style) {
3728     // TODO: add more styles
3729     case 'dot':         this.draw = this._drawDot; break;
3730     case 'square':      this.draw = this._drawSquare; break;
3731     case 'triangle':    this.draw = this._drawTriangle; break;
3732     case 'triangleDown':this.draw = this._drawTriangleDown; break;
3733     case 'star':        this.draw = this._drawStar; break;
3734     case 'image':       this.draw = this._drawImage; break;
3735     default:            this.draw = this._drawDot; break;
3736   }        
3737   
3738 }
3739 
3740 /**
3741  * Set a new value for the progress of the package
3742  * @param {number} progress    A value between 0 and 1
3743  */ 
3744 links.Network.Package.prototype.setProgress = function (progress) {
3745   this.progress = progress;
3746   this.autoProgress = false;
3747 }
3748 
3749 /**
3750  * Check if a package is finished, if it has reached its destination.
3751  * If so, the package can be removed.
3752  * Only packages with automatically animated progress can be finished
3753  * @return {boolean}    true if finished, else false.
3754  */ 
3755 links.Network.Package.prototype.isFinished = function () {
3756   return (this.autoProgress == true && this.progress >= 1.0);
3757 }
3758 
3759 /**
3760  * Check if this package is moving. 
3761  * A packages moves when it has automatic progress and not yet reached its 
3762  * destination.
3763  * @return {boolean}    true if moving, else false.
3764  */ 
3765 links.Network.Package.prototype.isMoving = function () {
3766   return (this.autoProgress || this.isFinished());
3767 }
3768 
3769 
3770 /**
3771  * Perform one discrete step for the package. Only applicable when the 
3772  * package has no manually set, fixed progress.
3773  * @param {number} interval    Time interval in seconds
3774  */ 
3775 links.Network.Package.prototype.discreteStep = function(interval) {
3776   if (this.autoProgress == true) {
3777     this.progress += (parseFloat(interval) / this.duration);
3778     
3779     if (this.progress > 1.0) 
3780       this.progress = 1.0;
3781   }
3782 }

3785 /**
3786  * Draw this package in the given canvas
3787  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3788  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3789  */ 
3790 links.Network.Package.prototype.draw = function(ctx) {
3791   throw "Draw method not initialized for package";
3792 }

3795 /**
3796  * Check if this object is overlapping with the provided object
3797  * @param {Object} obj   an object with parameters left, top, right, bottom
3798  * @return {boolean}     True if location is located on node
3799  */ 
3800 links.Network.Package.prototype.isOverlappingWith = function(obj) {
3801   // radius minimum 10px else it is too hard to get your mouse at the exact right position
3802   var radius = Math.max(this.radius, 10);  
3803   var pos = this._getPosition();
3804 
3805   return (pos.x - radius < obj.right && 
3806           pos.x + radius > obj.left &&
3807           pos.y - radius < obj.bottom &&
3808           pos.y + radius > obj.top);
3809 }
3810 
3811 /**
3812  * Calculate the current position of the package
3813  * @return {Object} position    The object has parameters x and y.
3814  */ 
3815 links.Network.Package.prototype._getPosition = function() {
3816   var pos = {
3817     "x" : (1 - this.progress) * this.from.x + this.progress * this.to.x,
3818     "y" : (1 - this.progress) * this.from.y + this.progress * this.to.y
3819   };
3820   return pos 
3821 }
3822 
3823 
3824 /**
3825  * get the title of this package. 
3826  * @return {string} title    The title of the package, or undefined when no 
3827  *                           title has been set.
3828  */ 
3829 links.Network.Package.prototype.getTitle = function() {
3830   return this.title;
3831 }
3832 
3833 /**
3834  * Retrieve the value of the package. Can be undefined
3835  * @return {Number} value
3836  */ 
3837 links.Network.Package.prototype.getValue = function() {
3838   return this.value;
3839 }
3840 
3841 /**
3842  * Calculate the distance from the packages location to the given location (x,y)
3843  * @param {Number} x
3844  * @param {Number} y
3845  * @return {Number} value
3846  */ 
3847 links.Network.Package.prototype.getDistance = function(x, y) {
3848   var pos = this._getPosition(),
3849       dx = pos.x - x,
3850       dy = pos.y - y;
3851   return Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
3852 }
3853 
3854 /**
3855  * Adjust the value range of the package. The package will adjust it's radius
3856  * based on its value.
3857  * @param {Number} min
3858  * @param {Number} max
3859  */ 
3860 links.Network.Package.prototype.setValueRange = function(min, max) {
3861   if (!this.radiusFixed && this.value !== undefined) {
3862     var factor = (this.radiusMax - this.radiusMin) / (max - min);
3863     this.radius = (this.value - min) * factor + this.radiusMin;
3864   }
3865 }

3869 /**
3870  * Redraw a package as a dot
3871  * Draw this link in the given canvas
3872  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3873  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3874  */ 
3875 /* TODO: cleanup
3876 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawDot = function(ctx) {
3877   // set style
3878   ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
3879   // draw dot
3880   var pos = this._getPosition();
3881   ctx.circle(pos.x, pos.y, this.radius);
3882   ctx.fill();
3883 }
3884 */
3885 
3886 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawDot = function (ctx) {
3887   this._drawShape(ctx, 'circle');
3888 }
3889 
3890 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawTriangle = function (ctx) {
3891   this._drawShape(ctx, 'triangle');
3892 }
3893 
3894 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawTriangleDown = function (ctx) {
3895   this._drawShape(ctx, 'triangleDown');
3896 }
3897 
3898 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawSquare = function (ctx) {
3899   this._drawShape(ctx, 'square');
3900 }
3901 
3902 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawStar = function (ctx) {
3903   this._drawShape(ctx, 'star');
3904 }
3905 
3906 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawShape = function (ctx, shape) {
3907   // set style
3908   ctx.fillStyle = this.color;
3909   
3910   // draw shape
3911   var pos = this._getPosition();
3912   ctx[shape](pos.x, pos.y, this.radius);
3913   ctx.fill();
3914 }
3915 
3916 /**
3917  * Redraw a package as an image
3918  * Draw this link in the given canvas
3919  * The 2d context of a HTML canvas can be retrieved by canvas.getContext("2d");
3920  * @param {CanvasRenderingContext2D}   ctx
3921  */ 
3922 links.Network.Package.prototype._drawImage = function (ctx) {
3923   if (this.imageObj) {
3924     if (this.value) {
3925       var scale = this.imageObj.height / this.imageObj.width;
3926       var width = this.radius || this.imageObj.width;
3927       var height = this.radius * scale || this.imageObj.height;
3928     }
3929     else {
3930       var width = this.imageObj.width;
3931       var height = this.imageObj.height;
3932     }
3933     var pos = this._getPosition();
3934 
3935     ctx.drawImage(this.imageObj, pos.x - width / 2, pos.y - height / 2, width, height);
3936   }
3937   else {
3938     //console.log("image still loading...");
3939   }
3940 }

3992 /**
3993  * get group properties of a groupname. If groupname is not found, a new group 
3994  * is added. 
3995  * @param {AnyType} groupname. Can be a number, string, Date, etc. 
3996  * @return {Object} group      The created group, containing all group properties
3997  */ 
3998 links.Network.Groups.prototype.get = function (groupname) {
3999   var group = this.groups[groupname];
4000   
4001   if (group == undefined) {
4002     // create new group
4003     var index = this.defaultIndex % links.Network.Groups.DEFAULT.length;
4004     this.defaultIndex++;
4005     group = {};
4006     group.borderColor     = links.Network.Groups.DEFAULT[index].borderColor;
4007     group.backgroundColor = links.Network.Groups.DEFAULT[index].backgroundColor;
4008     group.highlightColor  = links.Network.Groups.DEFAULT[index].highlightColor;
4009     this.groups[groupname] = group;
4010   }
4011   
4012   return group;
4013 }

4021  */ 
4022 links.Network.Groups.prototype.add = function (groupname, style) {

4024   return style;
4025 }

4031  */

4033 links.Network.isArray = function (obj) {

4035     return true;
4036   }

4038 }

4045 /**
4046  * @class Slider
4047  * 
4048  * An html slider control with start/stop/prev/next buttons
4049  * @param {DOM element} container  The element where the slider will be created
4050  */ 
4051 links.Network.Slider = function(container) {
4052   if (container === undefined) throw "Error: No container element defined";
4053 
4054   this.container = container;
4055   
4056   this.frame = document.createElement("DIV");
4057   //this.frame.style.backgroundColor = "#E5E5E5";
4058   this.frame.style.width = "100%";
4059   this.frame.style.position = "relative";
4060 
4061   this.title = document.createElement("DIV");
4062   this.title.style.margin = "2px";
4063   this.title.style.marginBottom = "5px";
4064   this.title.innerHTML = "";
4065   this.container.appendChild(this.title);
4066 
4067   this.frame.prev = document.createElement("INPUT");
4068   this.frame.prev.type = "BUTTON";
4069   this.frame.prev.value = "Prev";
4070   this.frame.appendChild(this.frame.prev);
4071 
4072   this.frame.play = document.createElement("INPUT");
4073   this.frame.play.type = "BUTTON";
4074   this.frame.play.value = "Play";
4075   this.frame.appendChild(this.frame.play);
4076 
4077   this.frame.next = document.createElement("INPUT");
4078   this.frame.next.type = "BUTTON";
4079   this.frame.next.value = "Next";
4080   this.frame.appendChild(this.frame.next);
4081 
4082   this.frame.bar = document.createElement("INPUT");
4083   this.frame.bar.type = "BUTTON";
4084   this.frame.bar.style.position = "absolute";
4085   this.frame.bar.style.border = "1px solid red";
4086   this.frame.bar.style.width = "100px";
4087   this.frame.bar.style.height = "6px";
4088   this.frame.bar.style.borderRadius = "2px";
4089   this.frame.bar.style.MozBorderRadius = "2px";
4090   this.frame.bar.style.border = "1px solid #7F7F7F";
4091   this.frame.bar.style.backgroundColor = "#E5E5E5";
4092   this.frame.appendChild(this.frame.bar);
4093 
4094   this.frame.slide = document.createElement("INPUT");
4095   this.frame.slide.type = "BUTTON";
4096   this.frame.slide.style.margin = "0px";
4097   this.frame.slide.value = " ";
4098   this.frame.slide.style.position = "relative";
4099   this.frame.slide.style.left = "-100px";
4100   this.frame.appendChild(this.frame.slide);
4101 
4102   // create events
4103   var me = this;
4104   this.frame.slide.onmousedown = function (event) {me._onMouseDown(event);}; 
4105   this.frame.prev.onclick = function (event) {me.prev(event);}; 
4106   this.frame.play.onclick = function (event) {me.togglePlay(event);}; 
4107   this.frame.next.onclick = function (event) {me.next(event);}; 
4108   
4109   this.container.appendChild(this.frame);
4110 
4111   this.onChangeCallback = undefined;
4112 
4113   this.playTimeout = undefined;
4114   this.framerate = 20; // frames per second
4115   this.duration = 10; // seconds
4116   this.doLoop = true;
4117 
4118   this.start = 0;
4119   this.end = 0;
4120   this.value = 0;  
4121   this.step = 0;
4122   this.rangeIsDate = false;
4123   
4124   this.redraw();
4125 };
4126 
4127 /**
4128  * Retrieve the step size, depending on the range, framerate, and duration 
4129  */ 
4130 links.Network.Slider.prototype._updateStep = function() {
4131   var range = (this.end - this.start);
4132   var frameCount = this.duration * this.framerate;
4133   
4134   this.step = range / frameCount;
4135 }
4136 
4137 /**
4138  * Select the previous index
4139  */ 
4140 links.Network.Slider.prototype.prev = function() {
4141   this._setValue(this.value - this.step);
4142 };
4143 
4144 /**
4145  * Select the next index
4146  */ 
4147 links.Network.Slider.prototype.next = function() {
4148   this._setValue(this.value + this.step);
4149 };
4150 
4151 /**
4152  * Select the next index
4153  */ 
4154 links.Network.Slider.prototype.playNext = function() {
4155   var start = new Date();
4156 
4157   if (!this.leftButtonDown) {
4158     if (this.value + this.step < this.end) {
4159       this._setValue(this.value + this.step);
4160     }
4161     else {
4162       if (this.doLoop) {
4163         this._setValue(this.start);
4164       }
4165       else {
4166         this._setValue(this.end);
4167         this.stop();
4168         return;
4169       }
4170     }
4171   }
4172 
4173   var end = new Date();
4174   var diff = (end - start);
4175 
4176   // calculate how much time it to to set the index and to execute the callback
4177   // function.
4178   var interval = Math.max(1000 / this.framerate - diff, 0);
4179 
4180   var me = this;
4181   this.playTimeout = setTimeout(function() {me.playNext();}, interval);
4182 };
4183 
4184 /**
4185  * Toggle start or stop playing
4186  */ 
4187 links.Network.Slider.prototype.togglePlay = function() {
4188   if (this.playTimeout === undefined) {
4189     this.play();
4190   } else {
4191     this.stop();
4192   }
4193 };
4194 
4195 /**
4196  * Start playing
4197  */ 
4198 links.Network.Slider.prototype.play = function() {
4199   this.frame.play.value = "Stop";
4200 
4201   this.playNext();
4202 };
4203 
4204 /**
4205  * Stop playing
4206  */ 
4207 links.Network.Slider.prototype.stop = function() {
4208   this.frame.play.value = "Play";
4209 
4210   clearInterval(this.playTimeout);
4211   this.playTimeout = undefined;
4212 };

4218 links.Network.Slider.prototype.setOnChangeCallback = function(callback) {

4220 };

4248 /**
4249  * Set the time acceleration for playing the history. Only applicable when
4250  * the values are of type Date.
4251  * @param {number} acceleration    Acceleration, for example 10 means play
4252  *                                 ten times as fast as real time. A value
4253  *                                 of 1 will play the history in real time.

4255 links.Network.Slider.prototype.setAcceleration = function(acceleration) {
4256   var durationRealtime = (this.end - this.start) / 1000; // in seconds
4257   
4258   this.duration = durationRealtime / acceleration;
4259   this._updateStep();

4263 /**

4267  *                            when the start is passed.

4269 links.Network.Slider.prototype.setLoop = function(doLoop) {

4279 links.Network.Slider.prototype.getLoop = function() {

4289     this.onChangeCallback();
4290   }

4293 /**
4294  * redraw the slider on the correct place
4295  */ 
4296 links.Network.Slider.prototype.redraw = function() {
4297   // resize the bar
4298   var barTop = (this.frame.clientHeight/2 - 
4299     this.frame.bar.offsetHeight/2);
4300   var barWidth = (this.frame.clientWidth -
4301     this.frame.prev.clientWidth - 
4302     this.frame.play.clientWidth - 
4303     this.frame.next.clientWidth - 30);
4304   this.frame.bar.style.top = barTop + "px";
4305   this.frame.bar.style.width = barWidth + "px";
4306   
4307   // position the slider button
4308   this.frame.slide.title = this.getValue();
4309   this.frame.slide.style.left = this._valueToLeft(this.value) + "px";
4310   
4311   // set the title
4312   this.title.innerHTML = this.getValue();
4313 };

4315 
4316 /**
4317  * Set the range for the slider
4318  * @param {Date or Number} start  Start of the range
4319  * @param {Date or Number} end    End of the range
4320  */ 
4321 links.Network.Slider.prototype.setRange = function(start, end) {
4322   if (start === undefined || start === null || start === NaN) {
4323     this.start = 0;
4324     this.rangeIsDate = false;
4325   }
4326   else if (start instanceof Date) {
4327     this.start = start.getTime();
4328     this.rangeIsDate = true;
4329   }
4330   else {
4331     this.start = start;
4332     this.rangeIsDate = false;
4333   }
4334   
4335   if (end === undefined || end === null || end === NaN) {
4336     if (this.start instanceof Date) {
4337       this.end = new Date(this.start);
4338     }
4339     else {
4340       this.end = this.start;
4341     }
4342   }
4343   else if (end instanceof Date) {
4344     this.end = end.getTime();
4345   }
4346   else {
4347     this.end = end;
4348   }
4349   
4350   this.value = this.start;
4351   
4352   this._updateStep();
4353   this.redraw();
4354 };
4355 
4356 
4357 
4358 /**
4359  * Set a value for the slider. The value must be between start and end
4360  * When the range are Dates, the value will be translated to a date
4361  * @param {Number} value
4362  */ 
4363 links.Network.Slider.prototype._setValue = function(value) {
4364   this.value = this._limitValue(value);
4365   this.redraw();
4366 
4367   this.onChange();
4368 };
4369 
4370 /**
4371  * retrieve the current value in the correct type, Number or Date 
4372  * @return {Number or Date} value
4373  */ 
4374 links.Network.Slider.prototype.getValue = function() {
4375   if (this.rangeIsDate) {
4376     return new Date(this.value);
4377   }
4378   else {
4379     return this.value;
4380   }
4381 };
4382 
4383 
4384 links.Network.Slider.prototype.offset = 3;
4385 
4386 links.Network.Slider.prototype._leftToValue = function (left) {
4387   var width = parseFloat(this.frame.bar.style.width) - 
4388     this.frame.slide.clientWidth - 10;
4389   var x = left - this.offset;
4390 
4391   var range = this.end - this.start;
4392   var value = this._limitValue(x / width * range + this.start);
4393   
4394   return value;
4395 };
4396 
4397 links.Network.Slider.prototype._valueToLeft = function (value) {
4398   var width = parseFloat(this.frame.bar.style.width) - 
4399     this.frame.slide.clientWidth - 10;
4400 
4401   if (this.end > this.start) {
4402     var x = (value - this.start) / (this.end - this.start) * width;
4403   }
4404   else {
4405     var x = 0;
4406   }
4407   var left = x + this.offset;
4408 
4409   return left;
4410 };
4411 
4412 links.Network.Slider.prototype._limitValue = function(value) {
4413   if (value < this.start) {
4414     value = this.start
4415   }
4416   if (value > this.end) {
4417     value = this.end;
4418   }
4419   
4420   return value;
4421 };
4422 
4423 links.Network.Slider.prototype._onMouseDown = function(event) {
4424   // only react on left mouse button down
4425   this.leftButtonDown = event.which ? (event.which === 1) : (event.button === 1);
4426   if (!this.leftButtonDown) return;
4427 
4428   this.startClientX = event.clientX;
4429   this.startSlideX = parseFloat(this.frame.slide.style.left);
4430 
4431   this.frame.style.cursor = 'move';
4432 
4433   // add event listeners to handle moving the contents
4434   // we store the function onmousemove and onmouseup in the graph, so we can
4435   // remove the eventlisteners lateron in the function mouseUp()
4436   var me = this;
4437   this.onmousemove = function (event) {me._onMouseMove(event);};
4438   this.onmouseup   = function (event) {me._onMouseUp(event);};
4439   links.Network.addEventListener(document, "mousemove", this.onmousemove);
4440   links.Network.addEventListener(document, "mouseup",   this.onmouseup);
4441   links.Network.preventDefault(event);
4442 };
4443 
4444 
4445 links.Network.Slider.prototype._onMouseMove = function (event) {
4446   var diff = event.clientX - this.startClientX;
4447   var x = this.startSlideX + diff;
4448 
4449   var value = this._leftToValue(x);
4450   this._setValue(value);  
4451   
4452   links.Network.preventDefault(event);
4453 };
4454 
4455 
4456 links.Network.Slider.prototype._onMouseUp = function (event) {
4457   this.frame.style.cursor = 'auto';
4458 
4459   this.leftButtonDown = false;
4460 
4461   // remove event listeners
4462   links.Network.removeEventListener(document, "mousemove", this.onmousemove);
4463   links.Network.removeEventListener(document, "mouseup", this.onmouseup); 
4464 
4465   links.Network.preventDefault(event);
4466 };

4473 /**
4474  * Popup is a class to create a popup window with some text
4475  * @param {DOM element}  container     The container object.
4476  */ 
4477 links.Network.Popup = function (container, x, y, text) {
4478   if (container) {
4479     this.container = container;
4480   }
4481   else {
4482     this.container = document.body;
4483   }
4484   this.x = 0;
4485   this.y = 0;
4486   this.padding = 5;
4487   
4488   if (x !== undefined && y !== undefined ) {
4489     this.setPosition(x, y);
4490   }
4491   if (text !== undefined) {
4492     this.setText(text);
4493   }
4494   
4495   // create the frame
4496   this.frame = document.createElement("div");
4497   var style = this.frame.style;
4498   style.position = "absolute";
4499   style.visibility = "hidden";
4500   style.border = "1px solid #666";
4501   style.color = "black";
4502   style.padding = this.padding + "px";
4503   style.backgroundColor = "#FFFFC6";
4504   style.borderRadius = "3px";
4505   style.MozBorderRadius = "3px";
4506   style.WebkitBorderRadius = "3px";
4507   style.boxShadow = "3px 3px 4px #BFBFBF";  
4508   style.whiteSpace = "nowrap";
4509   this.container.appendChild(this.frame);
4510 };
4511 
4512 /**
4513  * @param {number} x   Horizontal position of the popup window
4514  * @param {number} y   Vertical position of the popup window
4515  */
4516 links.Network.Popup.prototype.setPosition = function(x, y) {
4517   this.x = parseInt(x);
4518   this.y = parseInt(y);
4519 };
4520 
4521 /**
4522  * Set the text for the popup window. This can be HTML code
4523  * @param {string} text   
4524  */
4525 links.Network.Popup.prototype.setText = function(text) {
4526   this.frame.innerHTML = text;
4527 };
4528 
4529 /**
4530  * Show the popup window
4531  * @param {boolean} show    Optional. Show or hide the window
4532  */ 
4533 links.Network.Popup.prototype.show = function (show) {
4534   if (show === undefined) {
4535     var show = true;
4536   }
4537   
4538   if (show) {
4539     var height = this.frame.clientHeight;
4540     var width =  this.frame.clientWidth;
4541     var maxHeight = this.frame.parentNode.clientHeight;
4542     var maxWidth = this.frame.parentNode.clientWidth;
4543     
4544     var top = (this.y - height);
4545     if (top + height + this.padding > maxHeight) {
4546       top = maxHeight - height - this.padding;
4547     }
4548     if (top < this.padding) {
4549       top = this.padding;
4550     }
4551 
4552     var left = this.x;
4553     if (left + width + this.padding > maxWidth) {
4554       left = maxWidth - width - this.padding;
4555     }
4556     if (left < this.padding) {
4557       left = this.padding;
4558     }
4559     
4560     this.frame.style.left = left + "px";
4561     this.frame.style.top = top + "px";
4562     this.frame.style.visibility = "visible";
4563   }
4564   else {
4565     this.hide();
4566   }
4567 }
4568 
4569 /**
4570  * Hide the popup window
4571  */ 
4572 links.Network.Popup.prototype.hide = function () {
4573   this.frame.style.visibility = "hidden";
4574 }

4580 
4581 /** 
4582  * Event listener (singleton)
4583  */ 
4584 links.events = links.events || {
4585   'listeners': [],
4586 
4587   /**
4588    * Find a single listener by its object
4589    * @param {Object} object
4590    * @return {Number} index  -1 when not found 
4591    */  
4592   'indexOf': function (object) {
4593     var listeners = this.listeners;
4594     for (var i = 0, iMax = this.listeners.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4595       var listener = listeners[i];
4596       if (listener && listener.object == object) {
4597         return i;
4598       }
4599     }
4600     return -1;
4601   },
4602 
4603   /**
4604    * Add an event listener
4605    * @param {Object} object
4606    * @param {String} event       The name of an event, for example 'select'
4607    * @param {function} callback  The callback method, called when the 
4608    *                             event takes place
4609    */ 
4610   'addListener': function (object, event, callback) {
4611     var index = this.indexOf(object);
4612     var listener = this.listeners[index]; 
4613     if (!listener) {
4614       listener = {
4615         'object': object,
4616         'events': {}
4617       };
4618       this.listeners.push(listener);
4619     }
4620     
4621     var callbacks = listener.events[event];
4622     if (!callbacks) {
4623       callbacks = [];
4624       listener.events[event] = callbacks;
4625     }
4626     
4627     // add the callback if it does not yet exist
4628     if (callbacks.indexOf(callback) == -1) {
4629       callbacks.push(callback);
4630     }
4631   },
4632   
4633   /**
4634    * Remove an event listener
4635    * @param {Object} object      
4636    * @param {String} event       The name of an event, for example 'select'
4637    * @param {function} callback  The registered callback method
4638    */ 
4639   'removeListener': function (object, event, callback) {
4640     var index = this.indexOf(object);
4641     var listener = this.listeners[index]; 
4642     if (listener) {
4643       var callbacks = listener.events[event];      
4644       if (callbacks) {
4645         var index = callbacks.indexOf(callback);
4646         if (index != -1) {
4647           callbacks.splice(index, 1);
4648         }
4649         
4650         // remove the array when empty
4651         if (callbacks.length == 0) {
4652           delete listener.events[event];
4653         }
4654       }
4655 
4656       // count the number of registered events. remove listener when empty
4657       var count = 0;
4658       var events = listener.events;
4659       for (var event in events) {
4660         if (events.hasOwnProperty(event)) {
4661           count++;
4662         }
4663       }
4664       if (count == 0) {
4665         delete this.listeners[index];
4666       }
4667     }
4668   },
4669 
4670   /**
4671    * Remove all registered event listeners
4672    */ 
4673   'removeAllListeners': function () {
4674     this.listeners = [];
4675   },
4676   
4677   /**
4678    * Trigger an event. All registered event handlers will be called
4679    * @param {Object} object
4680    * @param {String} event
4681    * @param {Object} properties (optional)
4682    */ 
4683   'trigger': function (object, event, properties) {
4684     var index = this.indexOf(object);
4685     var listener = this.listeners[index]; 
4686     if (listener) {
4687       var callbacks = listener.events[event];
4688       if (callbacks) {
4689         for (var i = 0, iMax = callbacks.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4690           callbacks[i](properties);
4691         }
4692       }
4693     }
4694   }
4695 };
4696

4700 
4701 /**
4702  * Draw a circle shape
4703  */ 
4704 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.circle = function(x, y, r) {
4705   this.beginPath();
4706   this.arc(x, y, r, 0, 2*Math.PI, false);
4707 }
4708 
4709 /**
4710  * Draw a square shape
4711  * @param {Number} x horizontal center 
4712  * @param {Number} y vertical center 
4713  * @param {Number} size   size, width and height of the square
4714  */ 
4715 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.square = function(x, y, r) {
4716   this.beginPath();
4717   this.rect(x - r, y - r, r * 2, r * 2);
4718 }
4719 
4720 /**
4721  * Draw a triangle shape
4722  * @param {Number} x horizontal center 
4723  * @param {Number} y vertical center 
4724  * @param {Number} r   radius, half the length of the sides of the triangle
4725  */ 
4726 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.triangle = function(x, y, r) {
4727   // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equilateral_triangle
4728   this.beginPath();
4729 
4730   var s = r * 2;
4731   var s2 = s / 2;
4732   var ir = Math.sqrt(3) / 6 * s;      // radius of inner circle
4733   var h = Math.sqrt(s * s - s2 * s2); // height
4734   
4735   this.moveTo(x, y - (h - ir));
4736   this.lineTo(x + s2, y + ir);
4737   this.lineTo(x - s2, y + ir);
4738   this.lineTo(x, y - (h - ir));
4739   this.closePath();
4740 }
4741 
4742 /**
4743  * Draw a triangle shape in downward orientation
4744  * @param {Number} x horizontal center 
4745  * @param {Number} y vertical center 
4746  * @param {Number} r radius
4747  */ 
4748 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.triangleDown = function(x, y, r) {
4749   // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equilateral_triangle
4750   this.beginPath();
4751 
4752   var s = r * 2;
4753   var s2 = s / 2;
4754   var ir = Math.sqrt(3) / 6 * s;      // radius of inner circle
4755   var h = Math.sqrt(s * s - s2 * s2); // height
4756   
4757   this.moveTo(x, y + (h - ir));
4758   this.lineTo(x + s2, y - ir);
4759   this.lineTo(x - s2, y - ir);
4760   this.lineTo(x, y + (h - ir));
4761   this.closePath();
4762 }
4763 
4764 /**
4765  * Draw a star shape, a star with 5 points
4766  * @param {Number} x horizontal center 
4767  * @param {Number} y vertical center 
4768  * @param {Number} r   radius, half the length of the sides of the triangle
4769  */ 
4770 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.star = function(x, y, r) {
4771   // http://www.html5canvastutorials.com/labs/html5-canvas-star-spinner/
4772   this.beginPath();
4773 
4774   for (var n = 0; n < 10; n++) {
4775     var radius = (n % 2 === 0) ? r * 1.3 : r * 0.5;
4776     this.lineTo(
4777       x + radius * Math.sin(n * 2 * Math.PI / 10), 
4778       y - radius * Math.cos(n * 2 * Math.PI / 10)
4779     );
4780   }
4781 
4782   this.closePath();
4783 }
4784 
4785 /**
4786  * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1255512/how-to-draw-a-rounded-rectangle-on-html-canvas
4787  */ 
4788 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.roundRect = function(x, y, w, h, r) {
4789   var r2d = Math.PI/180;
4790   if( w - ( 2 * r ) < 0 ) { r = ( w / 2 ); } //ensure that the radius isn't too large for x
4791   if( h - ( 2 * r ) < 0 ) { r = ( h / 2 ); } //ensure that the radius isn't too large for y
4792   this.beginPath();
4793   this.moveTo(x+r,y);
4794   this.lineTo(x+w-r,y);
4795   this.arc(x+w-r,y+r,r,r2d*270,r2d*360,false);
4796   this.lineTo(x+w,y+h-r);
4797   this.arc(x+w-r,y+h-r,r,r2d*0,r2d*90,false);
4798   this.lineTo(x+r,y+h);
4799   this.arc(x+r,y+h-r,r,r2d*90,r2d*180,false);
4800   this.lineTo(x,y+r);
4801   this.arc(x+r,y+r,r,r2d*180,r2d*270,false);
4802 }
4803 
4804 /**
4805  * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2172798/how-to-draw-an-oval-in-html5-canvas
4806  */ 
4807 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.ellipse = function(x, y, w, h) {
4808   var kappa = .5522848,
4809     ox = (w / 2) * kappa, // control point offset horizontal
4810     oy = (h / 2) * kappa, // control point offset vertical
4811     xe = x + w,           // x-end
4812     ye = y + h,           // y-end
4813     xm = x + w / 2,       // x-middle
4814     ym = y + h / 2;       // y-middle
4815 
4816   this.beginPath();
4817   this.moveTo(x, ym);
4818   this.bezierCurveTo(x, ym - oy, xm - ox, y, xm, y);
4819   this.bezierCurveTo(xm + ox, y, xe, ym - oy, xe, ym);
4820   this.bezierCurveTo(xe, ym + oy, xm + ox, ye, xm, ye);
4821   this.bezierCurveTo(xm - ox, ye, x, ym + oy, x, ym);
4822 }

4826 /**
4827  * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2172798/how-to-draw-an-oval-in-html5-canvas
4828  */ 
4829 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.database = function(x, y, w, h) {
4830   var f = 1/3;
4831   var wEllipse = w;
4832   var hEllipse = h * f;
4833   
4834   var kappa = .5522848,
4835     ox = (wEllipse / 2) * kappa, // control point offset horizontal
4836     oy = (hEllipse / 2) * kappa, // control point offset vertical
4837     xe = x + wEllipse,           // x-end
4838     ye = y + hEllipse,           // y-end
4839     xm = x + wEllipse / 2,       // x-middle
4840     ym = y + hEllipse / 2,       // y-middle
4841     ymb = y + (h - hEllipse/2),  // y-midlle, bottom ellipse 
4842     yeb = y + h;                 // y-end, bottom ellipse
4843 
4844   this.beginPath();
4845   this.moveTo(xe, ym);
4846 
4847   this.bezierCurveTo(xe, ym + oy, xm + ox, ye, xm, ye);
4848   this.bezierCurveTo(xm - ox, ye, x, ym + oy, x, ym);
4849 
4850   this.bezierCurveTo(x, ym - oy, xm - ox, y, xm, y);
4851   this.bezierCurveTo(xm + ox, y, xe, ym - oy, xe, ym);
4852 
4853   this.lineTo(xe, ymb); 
4854   
4855   this.bezierCurveTo(xe, ymb + oy, xm + ox, yeb, xm, yeb);
4856   this.bezierCurveTo(xm - ox, yeb, x, ymb + oy, x, ymb);
4857 
4858   this.lineTo(x, ym); 
4859 }

4862 /**
4863  * Draw an arrow point (no line)
4864  */ 
4865 CanvasRenderingContext2D.prototype.arrow = function(x, y, angle, length) {
4866   // point
4867   var xp = x + length*0.5 * Math.cos(angle);
4868   var yp = y + length*0.5 *Math.sin(angle);
4869   
4870   // tail
4871   var xt = x - length*0.5 * Math.cos(angle);
4872   var yt = y - length*0.5 * Math.sin(angle);
4873 
4874   // inner tail
4875   // TODO: allow to customize different shapes
4876   var xi = x - length*0.4 * Math.cos(angle);
4877   var yi = y - length*0.4 * Math.sin(angle);
4878   
4879   // left 
4880   var xl = xt + length/3 * Math.cos(angle + 0.5*Math.PI);
4881   var yl = yt + length/3 * Math.sin(angle + 0.5*Math.PI);
4882   
4883   // right
4884   var xr = xt + length/3 * Math.cos(angle - 0.5*Math.PI);
4885   var yr = yt + length/3 * Math.sin(angle - 0.5*Math.PI);
4886   
4887   this.beginPath();
4888   this.moveTo(xp, yp);
4889   this.lineTo(xl, yl);
4890   this.lineTo(xi, yi);
4891   this.lineTo(xr, yr);
4892   this.closePath();
4893 }
